lines.text: With all my heart, I still love the man I killed.
If you love a person, you can forgive anything.
Strange that a man can live with a woman for ten years and not know the first thing about her.
Be flippant about your own crimes if you want to, but don't be flippant about mine!
I'll do whatever you think is right.
I don't think it's right, but I think it's expedient. Juries can sometimes be very stupid, and it's just as well not to worry them with more evidence than they can conveniently deal with.
